title: Microsoft Band 2 gets an app design guideline document and updated SDK
text:
Microsoft Band 2 gets an app design guideline document and updated SDK 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
The Microsoft Band 2 is scheduled to officially go on sale October 30, but Microsoft wants to help developers make apps that will work with ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
